Problem 1: An Unusual Pendulum


Context: Usually the pendulum problems we solve have the axis of symmetry and the COM as the same point, but here by adding a metal ball (black ball in the 3d model) we have moved the COM a bit to the right. In the model, the gold thread goes through the COM and the white thread goes through the axis of symmetry.

1.2

This is a follow-up to the "Unusual Disk on Slanted Plane" problem that I solved before. In this part our goal is to find all the properties related to the rotational dynamic of the system with respect to its symmetry axis. Please check out this link for the problem statement.
